properties.citation_desc: Suicidal thoughts and behaviors are associated with an increased decision-making bias for active responses to escape aversive states.
properties.citation_authors: Alexander J. Millner, Hanneke E. M. den Ouden, Samuel J. Gershman, Catherine R. Glenn, Jaclyn C. Kearns, Aaron M. Bornstein, Brian P. Marx, Terence M. Keane and Matthew K. Nock
properties.name: Suicidal thoughts and behaviors are associated with an increased decision-making bias for active responses to escape aversive states.
